They discuss joining a study group together and engage in stress-relieving activities like neck rubs and massages. Classmates A reassures and trusts Classmates B, showing care and understanding in their interactions.

In another event, Classmates A discovered Classmates B's secret and offered help and reassurance. Classmates B appreciated the trust and support from Classmates A. They also discussed setting realistic goals and finding balance in self-criticism, reflecting on growth and self-compassion. Overall, they share meaningful exchanges and support each other in different situations.
